TopicTitle: Please make more of the interface scalable (building @2560x1600 icons are micro)

Articles.Content:
Just did a full reinstall of the game and found that trying to play at my native resolution of 2560 x 1600 is nearly impossible. Could you please scale the interface so the buttons are larger at higher resolutions?

Thanks!
There's an option for that on the first settings page. UI size or something.

There's an option for that on the first settings page. UI size or something.

Really?! And it affects all buttons? OK going to try that out!
OK, no it doesn't not change what we need at high resolutions, that only changes the navball. See screenshot.
So basically what we need is for the UI size setting to affect everything... or possibly have a separate "General UI Size" slider as well...

Yea I recently just got the game and I'm running @ a resolution of 2560x1600. The UI size adjuster in the options menu is Flight UI Size which I have set to max. This obviously as the name implies only makes the Flight UI bigger or rather stretches it. Because the text or rather the graphics with text in them aren't much more readable.

It's not just the icons in the UI that don't scale well it's the text as well. It's insanely small. Setting my resolution lower on this monitor is really not an option as it doesn't scale well. Makes everything blury and ugly (or maybe that's just what 1920x1200 looks like lol). Not only that but it would seem ridiculous to lower the resolution by double to a $300 monitor from a $1200 monitor.

Don't think the devs really tested the game at high resolution. I'm sure if they did they would be just like "no" we need to scale that much higher. Oh well.

Probably not gonan get a true sense of how small it is on a screenshot.

But non the less here they are:

I wouldn't mind this. I play natively on 1600x900, so it's not that bad for me, but I can imagine it being a problem on my other computer, which runs at 2560x1600 (which is 2 of my laptop monitors turned sideways and put next to each other, XD)

A year later and still no reply or comment from developers. Game still doesn't scale the UI to hi res displays. Many additions and overhaul to the UI yet only adding a bigger need to have a proper scaling UI.
